thread.title: Curry laughs off Lawson’s ‘chillin’ on defense’ barb
thread.title_full: Curry laughs off Lawson’s ‘chillin’ on defense’ barb - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Curry laughs off Lawson’s ‘chillin’ on defense’ barb
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry scores against Denver Nuggets' Ty Lawson during NBA game at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Wednesday, April 15, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry scores against Denver Nuggets'...
New Houston point guard Ty Lawson told Yahoo Sports that he wanted to play for the Rockets, partly because Warriors point guard Stephen Curry was coasting. Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry scores against Denver Nuggets' Ty Lawson during NBA game at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Wednesday, April 15, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry scores against Denver Nuggets'...
New Houston point guard Ty Lawson told Yahoo Sports that he wanted to play for the Rockets, partly because Warriors point guard Stephen Curry was coasting.
